comments.comment: It appears that pytorch and TF don't support Fermi GPUs. Do we wish to continue support?

Pre-Kepler GPUs have been disabled by the PR referenced here. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sandeep-krishnamurthy>@sandeep-krishnamurthy</denchmark-link> Please close this issue. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/piiswrong>@piiswrong</denchmark-link> Please reopen this issue if it has been closed in error.
